ticket.title: current_url? doesn't work with relative_url_path
ticket.original-body:
The line
@@@ url_string == "#{request.protocol}#{request.host_with_port}#{request_uri}" @@@
should read
@@@ url_string == "#{request.protocol}#{request.host_with_port}#{@controller.relative_url_root}#{request_uri}" @@@
ticket.latest-body:
The line
@@@ url_string == "#{request.protocol}#{request.host_with_port}#{request_uri}" @@@
should read
@@@ url_string == "#{request.protocol}#{request.host_with_port}#{@controller.relative_url_root}#{request_uri}" @@@

version.body:
The line
@@@ url_string == "#{request.protocol}#{request.host_with_port}#{request_uri}" @@@
should read
@@@ url_string == "#{request.protocol}#{request.host_with_port}#{@controller.relative_url_root}#{request_uri}" @@@
version.title: current_url? doesn't work with relative_url_path

version.body: Closing ticket. If you still find this issue in Rails master or the 2-3-stable branch, just make a comment and I'll re-open it. If the issue does indeed still exist, please mention how the issue can be reproduced and make a patch. The contributor guide can be found here http://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/8994/sending-patches
version.body-html: Closing ticket. If you still find this issue in Rails master or the 2-3-stable branch, just make a comment and I'll re-open it. If the issue does indeed still exist, please mention how the issue can be reproduced and make a patch. The contributor guide can be found here http://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/8994/sending-patches
